EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_8_Product_Selector (2
EmailTemplate.subject: Find out how we can help improve your network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Need answers to your specific network challenges? Deploying new technologies, like VoLTE or VoWiFi, or improving your network’s security or performance requires careful planning, the right technologies, and an experienced partner to help before and after deployment.
We can help you better address your network challenges, but first, help us understand your situation in more detail.
Just fill out our three-minute questionnaire and upon completion you will get additional resources tailored for your specific network challenges. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
